sourcesContent:
import { Avatar, Box, Button, Divider, Flex, Heading, Input, List, ListItem, Text } from '@chakra-ui/react';
import React from 'react';

const Home = () => {
    return (
        <Flex flexDir="column" alignItems="center" paddingX={10} paddingY={5}>
            <Box width="480px">
                <Flex flexDir="column">
                    <Heading>Listagem de repositórios</Heading>
                    <Input
                        type="text"
                        placeholder="Username"
                        marginTop="3"
                    />
                    <Button type="button" marginTop="6">Pesquisar</Button>
                </Flex>
                <Flex flexDir="column" marginTop={10}>
                    <List>
                        <ListItem>
                            <Box bg="gray.300" padding={5}>
                                <Flex alignItems="center">
                                    <Avatar size="lg" name="Kris"
                                        src="https://github.com/krishnamuti.png" />
                                    <Heading marginLeft={2} fontSize="2xl">Kris</Heading>
                                </Flex>
                                <Divider />
                                <Text>Descrição</Text>
                            </Box>
                        </ListItem>
                    </List>
                </Flex>
            </Box>
        </Flex>
    );
};

export { Home };
